hero.subtitulo: We build modern websites and automate processes with artificial intelligence. Boost your business with technology solutions working 24/7 for you.
hero.beneficio1_texto: We design tailored solutions for your business to maximize results.
hero.beneficio2_texto: We automate tasks to improve efficiency and reduce operational costs.
hero.beneficio3_texto: We guide you through every step of the process, from idea to launch.

planes_web.descripcion: We offer flexible plans that adapt to your project. Whether it's a landing page or an advanced site with automations, we have the ideal solution for you.

beneficios_web.titulo: Why should you have a website?
beneficios_web.b2: Give a professional image to your audience
beneficios_web.b3: Show your products or services clearly
beneficios_web.b5: Make tasks like bookings or payments easier

landing.descripcion: A single page to present your value proposition and capture leads clearly and effectively.
landing.f1: What it is: a one-page website with scroll sections.
landing.f2: When to choose it: perfect if you're starting out or want more visibility for your business.
landing.f3: Objective: present your offer and capture leads using a simple form.

tienda.descripcion: Ecommerce to sell products/services with payments, shipping and ready-to-use integrations.
tienda.f1: What it is: an online store built in WordPress with WooCommerce.
tienda.f2: When to choose it: ideal to launch and scale online sales quickly and reliably.
tienda.f3: Objective: increase your online sales with integrated payments and shipping.

medida.descripcion: A personalized web app with backend, authentication and advanced features for specific processes.
medida.f1: What it is: a custom-made web application tailored to your business needs.
medida.f2: When to choose it: when your project requires special features not covered by standard solutions.
medida.f3: Objective: give you more control, scalability and customization in your digital processes.

proyectos.subtitulo: Here are some examples of web design and automation solutions we've built.
proyectos.aviso_sin_webs: We will soon add more web development projects.

samuel_segarra.descripcion: Landing page for Samuel Segarra, nutrition and training coach.

tomas_primo.descripcion: Landing page for Tomás Primo, full-stack developer and automation expert.

alejandro_romero.descripcion: Personal portfolio website for Alejandro Romero, web developer and AI expert.

planes_automatizacion.descripcion: Discover how artificial intelligence can help you save time, reduce costs and improve your customers' experience.

automatizaciones.descripcion: Automated workflows that connect your tools and remove repetitive processes in your business.
automatizaciones.f1: What it is: processes that integrate your apps and execute tasks without manual intervention.
automatizaciones.f2: When to choose it: when you waste time on repetitive work like copying data, sending emails or updating records.
automatizaciones.f3: Objective: optimize your time, reduce errors and save costs.

chatbots.descripcion: Virtual assistants that serve your customers instantly and personally 24/7.
chatbots.f1: What it is: conversational bots integrated in WhatsApp, Telegram or your website.
chatbots.f2: When to choose it: if you receive many recurring questions and need continuous support.
chatbots.f3: Objective: improve customer experience, capture more leads and increase conversions.

agentes.descripcion: Each agent has a mission: making your work easier and more efficient.

axel.descripcion: Analyses your processes and suggests improvements or automations to increase productivity, efficiency and competitiveness in the market.

ena.descripcion: Attracts and qualifies prospects from your website, ads and social media. Manages automated campaigns, nurtures leads and schedules calls or demos with your team.

milo.descripcion: Centralises sales, marketing and operations data. Builds dashboards and predictive reports to detect opportunities and optimise strategic decisions in real time.

lynk.descripcion: Provides instant support on WhatsApp, Telegram or web chat. Handles customers, manages sales and follows up after purchase with 24/7 conversational AI.

vex.descripcion: Manages social media, campaigns and online reputation. Schedules content, replies to messages and keeps your brand visually consistent across channels.

nero.descripcion: Answers calls with a natural voice. Schedules appointments, solves doubts and executes tasks connected to your systems 24/7.

aron.descripcion: Automates invoicing, quotes and payments. Tracks cash flow and generates clear, up-to-date financial reports.

quienes.intro: we believe in making the digital world more accessible, professional and automated. We create websites tailored to each business, and connect processes with automations and chatbots that save time and money. We are a young, technical team, eager to turn ideas into practical solutions.
quienes.alejandro_parrafo: Deeply passionate about web development and process automation, with experience in both areas. He has built multiple projects integrating tools like n8n and custom chatbots to improve efficiency and user experience.
quienes.tomas_parrafo: With previous experience as a backend developer. He is now focused on web development and automations, areas he is truly passionate about. He combines his technical background with curiosity for solving real problems, creating solutions that optimise processes and improve businesses' digital experience.

contacto.subtitulo: Do you have a project or need help? We reply in less than 24h.
contacto.swal_enviado_text: We’ll get back to you in < 24h.
contacto.swal_error_ocurrio_text: Try again in a few minutes.

footer.descripcion_parte2: we specialise in web development, AI automation and tech mentoring.
